title: Losing Neverland
description: All is not as it seems in Neverland.As for Peter & Hook, well I know the secret most don’t.The real truth behind the myth.The hidden wonder you’ve never known disguised as the notorious legend.I know the nightmare that brings Hook to his knees.The concealed facts which bring out nothing but his ruthless darkness.I know the inescapable reality that one day changed Peter Pan forever. I witnessed Peter’s inevitable fall from grace.His loss of innocence.A destiny he one day couldn’t fly away from.All you’ve ever been told is a lie.A hoax.A pixie trick.I know the truth because - I’m their ruin.I’m their demise.I’m the end of what was & the beginning of what’s to come.My name is Wendy Moira Angela Darling.I’m the inescapable fate they couldn’t defeat. The chosen one who inevitably forces their surrender.And I’m the reason for losing Neverland.
author: Evelyn Montgomery
